data.title: Explore List of 20+ Sport Names in English
data.meta_description: Sport Names: Do you think you know the names of all the sports you see? Check out the article to find out how many of these sport names you know and also learn more about some of the sports.
data.text:
Are you a sports fan or a player yourself? How familiar are you with the names of the different sports being played all over the world? Want to learn more about sports all across the globe? If your answer is yes, then you are at the right place. In this article, you will be introduced to the names of more than twenty sport names and also have a chance to learn more about some common sports you hear about constantly. Learning the names of sports is also a way to build your vocabulary, so go through the article and have fun learning.

Table of Contents

List of 20+ Sport Names

Explore More about the Most Common Sports

Frequently Asked Questions on the Names of Sports

List of 20+ Sport Names

Archery Baseball Basketball Billiards Badminton Boxing Bowling Bungee Jumping Cricket Cycling Chess Diving Dodgeball Fencing Figure Skating Football Golf Handball Hockey Horseback Riding Ice Hockey Judo Karate Kickboxing Kayaking Lacrosse Mixed Martial Arts Muay Thai Paragliding Paintball Rowing Rugby Skateboarding Shooting Swimming Surfing Taekwondo Table Tennis Volleyball Water Polo Wrestling Weight Lifting
